Description: Responsibilities: To plan and ensure availability and reliability of operational road tankers and SHAFAF-Pickups in compliance to all applicable government regulations and company’s policies and procedures. Provide on-the-job training and constructive feedback to subordinates to support their overall development. Supervise vehicle data collection related to vehicle performance such as kilometres ran, diesel consumption and trip timing by tanker to ensure vehicle operation efficiency.Skills
Skills: 5 years’ experience in fleet management, preferably in oil industry
Qualification-Bachelor Degree in Mechanical / Instrument / Chemical Engineering or equivalent
